paper_abstract: Brian Shackel is considered by many to be the grandfather of the field of human-computer interaction. The present paper provides a commentary to Shackel's seminal (1997) paper on the field, "HCI: Whence and Whither" with accompanying observations of his life's work and intellectual contributions. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Inventing HCI: The grandfather of the field
